import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; function Menu(props) { const [category, setCategory] = useState("Person"); const changeCategory = (target) => { setCategory(target); props.CategoryCall(target); // Use 'target' directly }; const handleLinkClick = (e, target) => { e.preventDefault(); // Prevent default anchor tag behavior changeCategory(target); }; return (
Ashok Dutta
); } export default Menu;
